entities.description: What month do all soldiers hate?
hints: Soldiers do a lot of this.

entities.description: Where does someone who can't stop thinking about money go?
Take off my skin and I won't cry, but you will. What am I?
hints: These are often used when cooking.

entities.description: I'm something you do when designing a castle, a boat, or a shoe. What am I?
hints: "Designing" as in what an architect would do.

entities.description: Always wax, yet always wane: I melt, succumbed to the flame. Lighting darkness, with fate unblest, I soon devolve to shapeless mess. What am I?
The alphabet goes from A to Z. What goes from Z to A?
What do you call people who are afraid of Santa Claus?
hints: When you have an irrational fear, we call it a phobia.
